participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and family-oriented with a passion for animal welfare.
participant_1.background: I can't eat ice cream, but I'll dress up in a costume to celebrate Halloween with my family. I don't exercise often because I have a lot of other things going on in my life. I now use my artistic talents to create games that promote animal welfare. I spent my last birthday at the library with Nanette. I am Canadian.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and entrepreneurial, always looking for ways to improve and have fun.
participant_2.background: My favorite pet is my dog, Charlie, because he's always happy to see me. I'm going to be working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel. I am a terrible speller. I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income. I keep my hair cut very short.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hey there, I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm doing pretty good, thanks for asking!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to create games that promote animal welfare. I also love spending time with my family and friends.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to be able to create games.
It's not too hard to learn, if you're interested!
Maybe I'll look into it! I have a lot of free time on my hands these days.
That's great! What else do you like to do with your free time?
I like to watch YouTube videos, play with my dog, Charlie, and go to the library.
Cool! I love reading and going to the library too.
I'm really glad to hear that! I'm always looking for new people to talk to about books.
Same here! I'm always up for a good book discussion
